Package ai

Class AILow

java.lang.Object
ai.AILow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class AILow extends Object implements Runnable
Our First AI: A dedicated client able to participate in the game by making random Moves. The client plays the cards it gets in the order it gets them.
Author:
Can Ren, Jonas Gottal, Rajna Fani
